title: Vanamaala Stud Earrings - A Touch of Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish
featuring a central Emerald gemstone (approximately 0.25 ct
good clarity) surrounded by sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) and Ruby simulants.
features: These Vanamaala inspired stud earrings boast a delicate, floral design. The filigree work in gold creates an airy and elegant framework. The Emerald center, a symbol of prosperity, is encircled by CZ stones that add brilliance. The ruby simulants complete the design.
colors: and White (CZ). The color combination is traditional and auspicious.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi
and small family functions. Adds a touch of elegance to both traditional and contemporary outfits.
description: These earrings represent a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and modern wearability. The high-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. The classic floral design, inspired by Vanamaala, offers an auspicious touch. Comfortable to wear and easy to maintain, they are a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
